title: Mobile Science Inquiry: Self-Directed Learning Design Through Information-Centric Environment Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and experimental procedures
context.additional_context: Focused on cultivating the ability to analyze scientific phenomena and solve problems using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can collect, analyze, and visualize scientific experiment data in real-time using mobile devices
Learners can design personalized learning pathways for scientific problem-solving in information-rich environments
Learners can share science project results with peers and provide feedback using mobile-based collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
